1.title: Communication Breakdown
1.plot: Months after Lyle's failed proposal to Catherine, these star-crossed lovers have become more crossed than lovers. Hannah's fear of becoming a Southern "spinster" puts her relationship with Louis on ice.

2.title: Pearls, Pajamas, and Lies
2.plot: Lyle and Catherine remain on shaky ground; Hagood's parents take some time off from farm life for a quick trip, but their arrival feels more like an interrogation; Daniel makes a big decision; Louis and Lyle head to New York City.

3.title: Duck, Duck, Goosed
3.plot: Hagood invites her friends to go duck hunting; Hannah tries to find out the truth about Catherine's other guy; Lyle decides to move away from Catherine; a silly prank between Louis and Lyle turns sour.

4.title: Duck, Duck, Boom
4.plot: A hunting trip at Hagood's family farm turns sour when Lyle's true feelings for Catherine push Louis to the point of no return. Meanwhile, as Catherine deals with her father's upcoming heart surgery, Daniel gets a blast from the past when Ashley tries to work her way back into the circle. And when everyone comes together at Hannah's Chrismukkah party, Catherine gets a surprise revelation about Lyle's intentions.

5.title: Paintballs of Fire
5.plot: It's a New Year, but these Savannahians are up to their old tricks. While Hagood's spirits rise as her sake dreams come to fruition, Daniel's mood hits a new low as he questions his life's purpose. Meanwhile, after Hannah and Louis spend a romantic weekend dashing through the snow, Hannah's friends give her a dash of cold reality. And although the gang tries to start 2018 off with a bang with paintball, the deadliest shots are fired when tensions between Catherine and Lyle come to a head.

6.title: Sorry, Not Sorry
6.plot: As Hagood busts out her brushes to set Catherine's portrait in motion, Louis ponies up big money for his sock biz to roll with the big brands at the PGA Trade Show. Upset with Catherine's dishonest facade, Hannah pushes Catherine to admit there's someone else in her life. Meanwhile, Hagood sets out to impress Mom by having a professional test her sake, but is she over her head? And after Lyle misses Catherine's housewarming party claiming he needs "space," Catherine flips the script and calls Lyle out for playing the victim.

7.title: Turks and Consequences
7.plot: Following a heated conversation that ended in Lyle and Catherine wanting space from each other, Hannah reunites the gang by taking everyone to Turks and Caicos for her dirty 30's birthday celebration. But when Louis pulls an all-nighter to make the flight from his trade show in Florida, he ditches Hannah's birthday dinner and gets the night off to a rough start. As tensions grow between Catherine and Lyle, Brandon confronts Lyle about his behavior, leading everyone to point fingers and take sides. Feeling guilty, Lyle finally gives Catherine the apology she's been ...

8.title: Down To The River To Pray
8.plot: Hannah's Turks and Caicos 30th birthday bash turned birthday brawl continues. - After Hannah pushes Louis to his breaking point, Louis unleashes his fury, airing all the intimate details of their relationship in the bedroom- or lack thereof. Back in Savannah, as Brandon plans a gala for Savannah's 285th birthday, Catherine's parents push her to finally commit to Lyle. Meanwhile, Hagood finds the support she needs from her boyfriend, Alex. Daniel reveals to Dad his unhappiness is driving him to travel and find himself. And after Hannah questions Louis' infidelity, ...

1.title: Welcome to Savannah, Y'all
1.plot: In the debut episode, Catherine welcomes Lyle back to Savannah putting their long distance relationship to the test; while Nelson is forced to face his storied past. Meanwhile, Ashley finally has a night out with the girls only to find her fun go up in flames.

2.title: Par for the Strip Golf Course
2.plot: Ashley confronts some hard truths about her marriage. As Catherine and Lyle settle into a "grown-up" relationship, Hannah looks forward to a future with "grown-up" Louis. But when Louis ends up playing strip golf with Ashley, all bets are off. The ladies attend a very traditional bridal shower for Happy's very non-traditional marriage

3.title: Boys of Summer
3.plot: Daniel prepares for his debut as a drag queen and Catherine ends up in the deep-end with her first interior design project.

4.title: Hurricane on the Horizon
4.plot: In the aftermath of Lyle's revelation that Ashley works as a baggage handler, Ashley hears a juicy rumor about Catherine and Lyle. Meanwhile, Happy urges her mother to support her marriage to Azam, and Hannah finds some unexpected opposition as she attempts to start a dress line. Later, as Hurricane Matthew nears Savannah, Catherine hosts a dinner party that quickly becomes a storm of its own.

5.title: The Perfect Storm
5.plot: After a stormy end to Catherine's dinner party, Hurricane Matthew forces the Charmers to evacuate Savannah. Lyle, Catherine, Daniel, Louis and Hannah head to Charlotte where they meet up with Charleston friends Shep, Thomas, and Austen. Meanwhile, in Augusta, Ashley reveals her marital issues to her mother. Later, the Charmers return home to a devastated Savannah.

6.title: Bridge Over Troubled Water
6.plot: Hannah's sisters throw a birthday party for Louis, even though Hannah is starting to question their relationship. Nelson seeks his mother's advice, and Catherine plans a party where Ashley decides to confront Hannah.

7.title: St. Simon Says
7.plot: It's the biggest cocktail party in St. Simons...and our Charmers are heading out to enjoy a full day of tailgating. As Hannah tasks Louis to plan a party, Ashley hits her breaking point after a social media post reveals shocking news. And as the boys hit the bars for some good ole fun, Louis gets the skinny on what really happened between Hannah's parents. Lyle and Catherine hit their stride and Daniel contemplates his future.

8.title: Engagement Rings & Petty Things
8.plot: Meanwhile, Hannah and Louis' relationship struggles come to a head.

imdb.plot outline: The "Southern Charm" franchise expands to Savannah, Ga., with this series that sheds light on the posh society within Georgia's oldest city. From bridge-club parties to oyster roasts, the social calendar is always full for Savannah socialites, including the longtime friends featured on this reality show. They are trying to make their mark on the world while navigating their legacies, love lives and personal relationships.
imdb.title: Southern Charm Savannah
plot: The "Southern Charm" franchise expands to Savannah, Ga., with this series that sheds light on the posh society within Georgia's oldest city.
